content: looking for a nice long crochet project you can really sink your teeth into look no further than this boho stripes blanket with the super drapey soft linen stitch modern-meets-vintage colorwork and oodles of texture with quick and easy tassels this is sure to make a treasured heirloom-quality piece for you or your loved ones video tutorial https //youtu be/imb5woupcx0 1 written pattern https //thesnugglery net/boho-stripes-blanket/ 2 ribblr pattern https //ribblr com/pattern/boho-stripes-blanket-crochet 3 1 https //youtu be/imb5woupcx0 2 https //thesnugglery net/boho-stripes-blanket/ 3 https //ribblr com/pattern/boho-stripes-blanket-crochet
